entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui TableView binding with custom view doesn't accept input #14464
  • Hot Reload Fails on Microsoft Subsystem for Android & Android Emulators for .razor pages #14462
  • FillRule.EvenOdd not working for shapes #14461
  • Open the accessibility of all theme related classes and structures. #14455
  • [Windows] Setter to Shadow when the VisualState is PointerOver causes a crash #14454

Closed

  • Buttons at end of layout (and Gesture Recognizers) do not trigger! ... Unless you HOT RELOAD the page #14292

PullRequests

Created

  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] [CI] Use the checkout dir parameter as the root of the test projects. #14460
  • [CI] Use the checkout dir parameter as the root of the test projects. #14458
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] [CI] Set the working directory for the build scripts. #14457
  • [CI] Set the working directory for the build scripts. #14451
  • Keyboard test fixes v2 #14397

Updated

  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness from the measureSpec #14452
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #14391
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
